page.title: 15DIALECT AROUND HONLEY
page.content:
In the 1980s there is far more movement of population from one part of the country to another than ever before. This has led to dialects being far less marked than in the past. However, here are some dialect or slang expressions still in use around Honley.
baht - without botch - to do a job carelessly cal - to gossip din - noise frame - to do something well kop - to take hold of something or recieve a pnishment lake - to play oluss - always owt - anything throng - busy wit - commonsense
